Posts.EditableText: They're so cute and fuzzy! [url=http://www.dragcave.net:zexdmvf7]Dragon Cave.net[/url:zexdmvf7] lets you raise up your own dragon based on the number of views they get, making them great for Forum Signitures. I already have four, and you can see them below I only made this topic because I saw that Elex has followed my lead and grabbed two eggs for herself! I named my Duo-Headed Dragon after us ^.^
